basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Stan Hoig Endowed Memorial Scholarship in History

description: This scholarship is awarded to honor the memory of Dr. Stan Hoig and recognizes a student who produces a paper worthy of submission to a scholarly journal on a topic pertaining to the history of the American West. Dr. Hoig authored 25 books and a variety of articles about U.S. Western history and American Indian relations. He was a professor at UCO for 23 years. Eligibility Requirements Major in History, History Education, History Museum Studies, or Geography Submit a paper on the American West, including Oklahoma, American Indians, or any other aspect of the region. (Recipient must be submitting the paper for publication in The Chronicles of Oklahoma or other scholarly journal) Minimum 3.5 GPA in grad program or 3.0 in undergraduate program Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
